I absolutely adore these sweaters, this is my 4th ....and I NEED at least 2 more... LOL.  In all seriousness these sweaters are soooo soft !! The fit is casual and so far the material holds up well and I always get compliments.
Worked out good for my wife. Because she took it off for me.
Love it!! The fit and the material were perfect!
I love this sweater! Fits great and is soft with zero itch. You can kind of see a bra through the knit design, but not enough for an undershirt.
Might need to wear a little something underneath. Love the burgundy color and the large size was fine for me.
Purchased this as a gift for my daughter and she loves it. Color is pretty, well made, warm, comfortable,stretchy. good quality product. Would reccomend to family and friends
True to size and oh so soft. Going to get more colors because this has become my new favorite sweater. Warm enough to cut through a winter chill but still light enough to keep you from over heating.

I was pleasantly surprised with how soft this sweater is. It is also very loose fitting, particularly in the arms (which I personally like). I was a little hesitant about the design in the chest area, but it doesn’t appear to be see-through at all. I only gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because I haven’t washed it yet. I may update later after a few washes.  For reference, I bought a Small and I am 5’1” and 125 lbs.

评论概述: Sweater is very nice and soft

Right length, soft material

This is super comfy and really cute.  It is one of those shirts that can be dressy or casual.  I ordered a size up and I'm glad I did.  Typically a size M but bought a Lg and it fit great.  I would definitely size up unless you want a tighter fit.  I do not wear a cami underneath it and I don't feel like it's thin enough material to need it.

Size chart is accurate.  Ordered based on size large measurements.  Soft, comfortable and light weight. I washed it before I wore it in cold water on delicate and laid flat to dry. I'll think I'll be ordering a couple more colors!
Very soft, lightweight top.  I ordered the red and unfortunately you can see your bra and skin through the crotchet part of the upper chest, so I returned it.
This sweater is lightweight and beautiful. The color is just as described and fits true to size.

Okay, I’m shocked beyond belief. Normally Amazon sweaters and tops come in and they’re go backs because of quality nd I don’t often write reviews.  WOW, this is really a nice sweater. I purchased the black which always works in my closet. Although I wish they had more plain colors. The quality really threw me. Very nice and soft material. It’s not thick and not thin. It’s just right for what I was looking for. . I’m usually between a medium and a large but purchased a few sweater tops that were not as nice in mediums and they were a bit small so purchased this one in a large. Fits great. I’m 5’8” and about 148lb. This sweater can be worn as a layering piece or alone. It makes for a cute tuck in the front and is below the hip line. Perfect length. It even smelled nice. WTH. 🤦🏻‍♀️. No it won’t keep you warm if you live in the arctic. I’m in SoCal and mornings and evenings are cold enough for layering. I wasn’t expecting to receive a quality sweater. Thanks for quality for a change.

I purchased a couple of these sweaters. Size small fits perfects. Sweaters price is reasonable and the quality of the sweater is good. Quality not to heavy and not to thin. It’s very comfortable and love the style whether it’s the solid or multiple colors.
Soft and comfortable
Comfortable! I would get a size smaller next time. Runs abit big.
Love the fit. I purchased three other colors after the first wear. First as stated and quality is good
The shirt is amazing I love it but I don’t like how see through the stitches are have to watch what you wear under it  ..but it looks great and is soft

I’ve washed it several times (washed it under delicate and air-dried) and it still looks as good as it did when I bought it.
Wanted to love these but the stitching was see thru and was thinner than I needed so  I had to return

I was a little reluctant to order a sweater without feeling the material and seeing the true color. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this sweater. It is so soft and comfortable. Fits perfectly! I love it and plan to buy another one in a different color!
I am really pleased with purchase and going to order a second one.

This is not nearly as long as it appears on the model and barely hits my hips. The material is also quite thin and transparent. I have to wear another shirt under it and it still isn’t warm. It might be fine for early fall or late spring, but not winter.
I love everything about this sweater except the sleeves are way too long. If I had longer arms I would buy in more colors.

The sweater is not as long as what is pictured on the model. There is absolutely no way to tuck a front piece in. I am just under 5’4”, so definitely not tall and the sweater barely hit at the waist of my pants. Was so disappointed, I wanted to love this sweater. The only positive about the sweater was the material was soft.
This is very good quality and very pretty !
It's a light weight and comfy. I ordered a large, my normal size and it fit perfect.
Loved the minute I tried this sweater on.
No Style or shape. They must've clipped the back on the model to make it look cute.  It's fine if you don't care what you look like.
Love it

Bought a 2xl....im 5'7 215 lbs...it was perfect fit..little baggy on arms than I'd like but fir body perfect and loose as I don't like tops sticking to body. Perfect for holiday party. Would buy in other colors.
It’s a nice, lightweight sweater. Soft, cozy, and fits true to size. Doesn’t fit so tight that the belly is noticeable, and because of that is quite flattering.
Bought it for wife. Went to dinner party and she got compliments. Got it off when we got home and hammer down time in the B room boyz!!!

Thos sweater was so cute and I loved the color and style, lightweight it's cheap. Washed it once and the texture balled up and it shrunk. I wash everything in cold and delicate dry on low setting. Sweater now looks years old. I'm sad.  Don't buy it.
Soft sweater.  Fits nice.  Arms not super long so probably will not dry in dryer.
Sweater is on the larger side and does not wash well.  I washed it on delicate in a laundry bag, line dry and it came out looking like it had been washed on a normal setting 10 times.

Lovely!

This sweater is so soft and fit perfectly.
